   function int_to_bin(n) result(bin_str)
      integer, intent(in) :: n
      character(len=:), allocatable :: bin_str
      integer :: i, len
      bin_str = ''
      if (n == 0) then
          bin_str = '0'
          return
      end if
      do while (n > 0)
          bin_str = trim(adjustl(achar(mod(n,2)+48))) // bin_str
          n = n / 2
      end do
